title: Elementalist Lux Skin
body:
Seriously, is it just me or is the E on her skin almost impossible to see, especially during combat?

I take it there are no skins on Summoners Rift to keep the map visually clear, yet it's near impossible to actually see some of her abilities before it's too late.

replies.body: I have thought that her E was a little misleading. Not difficult to see, as such, but difficult to visually identify as her E before it hits the ground and becomes an AOE.
